text: The 2015–16 North Caledonian Football League will be competed for by six clubs playing ten matches each. Golspie Sutherland were the defending champions. Invergordon returned to the league following a two-year absence. Sutherland United withdrew from the league prior to the start of the season. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team ! Location ! Home ground ! Capacity !
